title: The Elegant Sea of Savagery
summary:
Irina Nodiac, the eldest daughter of the Marquis, was entrusted to Count Elenoa Schuberg after her father's business continued to fail. All rights were handed over to Elenoa, whom she has known since childhood.

"You belong to me. So don't go messing around."
"Are you treating me like an object?"

However, even though she became a maid, her reputation of a "Crazy Bitch" during Academy days will never change. And now, Irina, who is self-disciplined and confident, stands in front of Elenoa.

"I can do more than what meets the eye. I can carry a lot of stuff."

Elenoa, who wants to own her completely, and Irina, who is trying to move forward despite difficult situations. What kind of voyage will they embark on in the future?

title: The Princess in The Henhouse
summary: No summary available.

title: Beyond Walpurgis
summary:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?

title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Acer’s had enough of it! That’s right. Acer isn’t quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world...meaning he’s got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He’s also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Acer leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that’s more his pace. See what excitement awaits in the outside world full of humans, dwarves, and even other elves!

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

title: The Dignity Of Romance
summary: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.

title: Deeply In Love
summary:
Because of a heartbreak in her past, Kirino decided to live more for her idol than for actual boys, but one day, transfer student Kametani-kun comes, who has a somewhat similar vibe to her idol! When Kametani-kun glares at the girls saying, “Don’t even think about talking to me!” on the very first day of transferring to the school, Kirino gets intrigued by him and learns his secret and…?!

(Source: K Manga)

title: Let Me Kidnap the Male Lead!
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel that I think I read sometime in the past. In the not far future, I'm fated to become the fiancée of the villain, but that's well... Won't it change following the way that I live?

"My ideal type is a man who is 190 cm, handsome, rich, has a rank at least above a Count, and won't grow a gut even when they get old!"

But before I could even find a husband I saved the life of the young male lead? After that my plan for an easy life kept getting messed up!

"I'm sorry, but Ariel said that she can't take her eyes off me because I'm the prettiest and handsomest person in the world."

"What? I did?"

"P-pardon my rudeness. Please forget my marriage proposal!"

"Hold on! No! Wait!"

---
[Original Web Comic](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97402)

title: The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: I’ll Borrow Your Face
summary:
1-3. Though I'd Always Loved You  
When Saki was in elementary school, she was dumped without notice by Chikage who was eight years her senior. She was extremely shocked because she believed that he would be her future husband! With a change of attitude, while at the high school entrance ceremony she decided that she dreamed of finding a new love, but at that time she met Chikage again, who has now become a teacher. As usual, she is shocked to realize that she still has feelings for Chikage. How does Chikage feel about Saki…?!  
  
4. My Lovely Beast  
Modoka decides to confess to her long-time crush, but accidentally gets the wrong person!?  
  
5. Love, to Burn, Fingertip  
Mari wants to be a manicurist, but is too shy to ask to paint someone's nails. Is her dream already out of reach?  
  
6. In my Shining Eyes, I See Your Face  
When Tae falls down the stairs, it might just change her world…

title: Let’s Hide My Younger Brother First
summary:
I've possessed a character in an R-rated BL manhwa. It's in a world where people, whose craziness ranges from one to ten, appear.

"Franz, can you take off your clothes for a moment?"

"Sister? Wh-why my clothes?"

Their crazy serenade had already begun. Having been faced with the violence my younger brother had to endure, I made a vow.

"Instead of Franz, I'll have *Schuette* instead."

Those people are coming soon. The people who will exterminate my family, and when that's not enough, they'll devour my younger brother's innocence.

"And I'll become a knight to succeed our family and carry on its legacy."

If he doesn't go, I'll die! That's how I thoroughly hid my brother and decided attend all the official events myself. …But something's wrong.

"I do! I love Kyla Vesta!"

"If Young Miss gets hurt, then I'll…"

"I don't feel the need to wait any longer."

Didn't you all like men? Why are you all suddenly obsessed with me?

---
The fate of a girl in a BL novel is a tragic one. Girls are either vaguely helpful, evil, or add nothing to the plot. So what happens when you turn into the older sister of a BL novel protagonist? The older sister who dies a tragic death at the hands of a madman who’s infatuated with your younger brother? You go with your gut instinct: hide him. Hide your brother from everything, especially men, that could harm him and you. That’s the task that Kyla Vesta is set with in this life, and a task that she’s determined to complete.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EC%84%A0-%EB%82%A8%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D%EB%B6%80%ED%84%B0-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%90/2649), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57492806)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/hide_brother)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9813/)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000164)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.fizzo.org/page/share/?bid=7838953455539453182&isNew=1&from=copy_link&group=2&d=5769532665904477950&language=id&region=ID)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74283)

title: My Childhood Friends Are trying to Kill Me
summary: I not only reincarnated into someone who died in an absurd fashion, but I also took the crown prince's place and went to the secret neutral territory, where male members of the five imperial families gathered. As a result… my childhood friends know me as a boy.    “Goodbye, guys." I cried in front of my friends who I would never meet again. That was because officially, I (the prince) was going to die soon!    It was fun spending time with them, but I will never see them again. I hope everyone lives happily!    ***    After many years, my childhood friends turned heroes who defeated the wild dragon visited me.    "…Was it you? The one who killed my friend?"    “After killing the previous crown prince, the murderer is said to be living comfortably as a princess, right?”    “I will torture you, so much so you'll wish for death."     "Answer me. Why did you kill him?”    Of course, they didn't recognize me at all. No, that's not the problem… the problem is that my childhood friends are trying to kill me. Wait a second, guys!

title: Everything Changed After I Died
summary:
My funeral has begun.

“How can she not shed tears when her twin sister died?”

“I heard she’s an idiot, so the rumors must be true.”

“I heard she has an inferiority complex. Who knows, maybe she is happy inside.”

I died of poison. And overnight I became Mergen’s burden, Irene.

You said you wanted to live like me? No, Irene. You shouldn’t live like that.

***

“You’re not going anywhere without my permission, Noona.”

Since when did Abel, who treated Irene like a bug, start calling me Noona?

“Keep your promise. Our deal isn’t over yet.”

My ex-fiancé, with whom I had a strictly business relationship, started treating Irene like the old me.

“I don’t care what it is. I’m a vulgar mongrel, unlike you, so I can digest whatever I swallow.”

Why does the Grand Duke, whom I thought was the enemy, do this?

The attitudes of the three men are puzzling. It is said that there are no permanent enemies or allies, but has there ever been a time when things were so unclear as now?

title: The Duke’s Obsession with His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: Interspecies Protection Agency
summary:
Count Carlos is a half-demon, a hybrid of demon and human?!

Sera, who was kicked out of the mansion where she had worked for 10 years overnight for discovering the Count’s secret. Barely managing to find a new job, she ends up at the ‘Xenogeneic Protection Management Bureau’.

Sera, who became the caretaker of the vampire ‘Vlad family’, thought she would live happily with the xenogeneic beings, but…

The previous caretaker stole the Vlad family’s heirloom ‘Red Gem’ and ran away? Sera is threatened by the family to find the ‘Red Gem’.

By night a caretaker, by day searching for the heirloom, even a suspicious crown prince approaches Sera, who is struggling…

Will the new caretaker Sera be able to safely retrieve the Red Gem?

title: The Grim Reaper Duke’s Obsessive Contract Mother
Perfect Secret Love: The Bad New Wife Is A Little Sweet
summary: “How perverted is Si Ye Han’s taste? He still wants me like this?” Waking up, she looked at her reflection in the mirror: explosive wig, tattoos, and demon-like makeup. Any normal person’s eyes would burn if they looked at her for more than a second.

title: King of Gacha ~God’s Gamer~
summary: Ryuuki has been betrayed by the people he trusted and has fallen to the lowest ranks of society. Hoping for his luck to turn for the better, he spends his days playing at the “Randombox”. His aim is the SSR-rank reward, the right to make an account for the game “Labyrinth”! Sadly, not only did he actually manage to pull his greatest wish, but that too got stolen from him. However, that’s when Ryuuchi’s true luck started! “As long as you can pull it, you will be able to use The System and defy all logic”. Everything stolen from me… But I will take it all back through Gacha!!

title: The Genius Who Sees Through the World
summary: As a child, Shin Woo-jin was kidnapped and locked away in a warehouse, forced to live as a slave. But against all odds, he was rescued and finally stepped into the outside world. Though free, Woo-jin wasn’t like other children. He had an extraordinary gift—the ability to read people. By observing the smallest facial expressions and unconscious gestures, he could see through their thoughts, emotions, and intentions with near-perfect accuracy. Like a profiler, like a modern-day Sherlock, Woo-jin learned to navigate the world, one observation at a time. But for someone who sees too much, living an ordinary life is the hardest thing of all. All he ever wanted was a peaceful, simple life. But the world had other plans. “As I thought… living a normal life is far too difficult.”

title: Back from the Abyss: I Am the Disaster
summary: The Immortal Emperor family was wiped out overnight, and the young master Li Chen was thrown into the most mysterious and dangerous abyss! Eight years later, he broke out of the abyss, the empress in his left hand, and the gods and demons in his right hand, and everything he went was

title: The Youngest Son of the Eunhae Merchant Group
summary:
The youngest son of the Eunhae Merchant Group.

Eun Seoho was born with an unmatched talent for business.

"Why is the Martial Alliance after me...?"
"They say the higher-ups in the Alliance found you bothersome. All because of your money."

Killed by the sword of the so-called righteous Martial Alliance, I suddenly return to the day I first began learning the trade. This time, I swear I won't live with any regrets.

"I'll bring you down with the money you looked down on."

Armed with a genius mind and exceptional martial arts skills, the legendary journey of Eun Seoho, the graetest Merchant Emperor in history, begins!

title: Doggy Romance
summary:
“My dog, who is like my own child, has turned out to be the pet heir to a chaebol family?” 

A year has already passed since the abandoned General’s adoption. But this lovable guy has not only become family to the lonely Dohun, but has also fetched him a destiny-like love with “Chaeyoung Lee.” However, Chaeyoung is by no means an easy opponent. Just as love is beginning to blossom, a second-generation chaebol appears out of the blue, claiming that they’ll take General away. And then, there is the revelation of General’s shocking secret. Will Dohun be able to protect both his love and his family?

title: My Hot Harem Has Turned Cold On Me!
I Will Buy Divine Power With Money!
Love or Love
summary:
**What if you find the cutest girl in your class, soaked in ditch? Sandai helped her... and his life changed from that day!**

A high-school boy Sandai, who liked to spend his time alone, accidentally helped the most beautiful girl in his class, Shino, when she fell into a ditch near his home. He let her use shower at his home, and lend her some clothes, although he had never talked with her before.

From that day, she started to act like his friend. In fact, she seems to like him... but that can't be! She's the most popular babe in his high school! But what he didn't know was, Shino had never went out with a guy. She was not very good with guys, and Sandai was the first guy she could talk naturally with. As they spend time together, Sandai can't help himself to have special feelings for Shino.

A story of a boy whose life was completely changed by a cute babe!

(Source: BookWalker Global)

title: To Julie
summary: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title: Dear, Not Cunning Witch
summary:
Talent doesn't always run in the family.
In an age ruled by science, there remain almighty witches with mythical powers. However, Diana ended up lacking any of her mother's witchly talent. In fact, ever since she began training at the age of 7, her only goal was to reunite with her sister. But life never turns out how we want, does it?

title: My Overly Sweet Boss
summary:
All of a sudden, my parents decided to play matchmaker and set me up with another man. I don't have a boyfriend and I thought it wouldn't hurt to meet the guy, but it turned out to be my manager, a.k.a. The Demon Boss!

Moe is frightened when her parents force her and the Demon Boss to live together on the premise of marriage. But, to her surprise, the manager seems like a totally different person at home...?

A sweet slapstick office romance between a Demon Boss and his klutzy subordinate.

---
• [Official Thai](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1662)

title: Holy Idol
summary: The girl group, MYSTERY, which has remained unpopular even after three years together, suddenly announces their separation on their third anniversary. The first team, known for its hot and sexy style, is led by the original captain, Windy. However, the new captain, Wangshu, with her sweet and lively image, has been appointed unexpectedly. Wangshu appears to be obedient and sensible, always clinging to Windy, but it seems she harbors special feelings for this "jiejie"...

title: Is the Friend of a Friend a Stranger?
summary:
Seven years ago, I promised my best male friend that we would always be friends.
When I reunited with him in high school, he was…… the neatest and most beautiful girl in the school!? And yet, she acts the same old way only in front of me……

A pure romantic comedy about a beautiful girl who was supposed to be my best “male friend”, now adapted into a comic!
___
**Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4)

**Additional Sites:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tenbin_sneaker)

title: I Became the Rabbit Heroine’s Stepmother
summary: Gloria wakes to find that she has become the infamous evil stepmother of a cute little werebunny?! She has mysteriously entered a fantastical world of knights and werebeasts, but not as its main character. Now, she must prove that she is not the terrible person everyone thinks she is. It won’t be easy, but she has help. The World Tree’s butterfly guardians will aid her in winning the trust of her new husband and stepdaughter.

title: Loving Summer Sky
summary: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title: The regressor only protects me
summary:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.

title: Crash On Paradise
summary: Ange, the daughter of Duke Glaster, believes her life is all planned out as she is set to marry Philip Cardiner, the rightful heir to the throne. However, her plans are disrupted when Philip's brother, William Cardiner, schemes against him and removes him from the line of succession. In order to secure his power, William forces Ange to marry Aiden Fitzroy, an illegitimate child born between the emperor and a commoner. Will Ange learn to love the humble stranger she was forced to marry?

title: Wedding Strategy
summary: No summary available.

title: Marriage Blues
summary: On her wedding day, Hana Gu realizes her relationship lacks love and flees the ceremony. During her escapade, she runs into her ex-boyfriend, Gawi Nam who helps her by using his mysterious ability to time travel into the past. Determined to erase her unwanted marriage, she uses this ability to try and change her fate, but the future proves less malleable than expected. Amid repeated failures, she finds solace in Gawi, who is also trapped in the past, facing similar struggles. As they fight fate together, old feelings from their first love resurface, making Hana question -- does she truly want to change her fate?

title: I Reincarnated As A Villainess And Became Rich
summary:
"Prepare yourself, Protagonist. With this power, I will change this predetermined future."

One day, he was suddenly reincarnated into the world of his favorite romance RPG. However, the body he had reincarnated into belonged to the 'Incompetent Evil Prince' Harold who had his engagement broken off with the heroine. On top of that, according to the setting, he wasn't able to use his magic power and would be defeated by the protagonist. But, it'll be different this time.

First, he stopped his engagement from being broken off with the heroine and started training himself. Then, he obtained a power different from the one he had in the original work, and overwhelmed everyone with the enormous magic power he shouldn't have been able to use! And before he realized it, his single-minded pursuit of strength had also gotten the attention of the other heroines...

title: The Words of The Beloved Sun
summary:
The collected anthologies of Satoshi Mizukami's oneshots.  
  
Volume 1: Ribbit Ribbit
- Chapter 1 - Gekogeko:
About a girl whose boyfriend is a frog. 
- Chapter 2 - Yaichirou  
- Chapter 3 - Densetsu no Otoko  
- Chapter 4 - Joreishi  
- Chapter 5 - Dokusho no Jikan  
- Chapter 6 - Kaijin Natsugorou  
- Chapter 7 - High Jump Rabbit  
- Chapter 8 - Koutetsu Shinshou Omega Frog  
- Chapter 9 - Ryuu to Shoujo to Hyakkichou
  
Volume 2: Cheep Cheep
- Chapter 1-3 - Piyopiyo  
A tale of a chick which never grows into a chicken.    
- Chapter 4 - Makai Zanyouken: Dokidoki Jigokuhen  
- Chapter 5 - Ganbatte-chan to Yameyouze  
- Chapter 6 - Erabu Michi  
- Chapter 7 - Thunder Girl to Hyakkichou  
- Chapter 8 - Kazaana Atama to Hyakkichou

Volume 3: Galactic Emperor Ginga Thunder's Excellent Adventure  
- Chapter 1 - My Fist  
Earth's ultimate weapon is deployed to face a threat of intergalactic proportions, and learns a little something about life.  
- Chapter 2 - Nell, The Artist of Shambala  
- Chapter 3 - Wedding Bells in Monster Town (Koi no Suzu Hyakki)  
- Chapter 4 - The Awakening  
The terrible origin tale of the scourge of worlds, Galactic Emperor Ginga Thunder.  
- Chapter 5 - Kare no Tabi ga Owaru  
- Chapter 6 - Wani Onii-san (My Brother is a Crocodile)  
Onii-san has turned into a crocodile! How is his sister, who has a brother complex, going to use love to overcome this forbidden interspecies obstacle?  
- Chapter 7 - Suna no Wakusei no Tami (Denizens of the Sand Planet)   

Chapter 66 of [Lucifer and the Biscuit Hammer](https://mangadex.org/title/6ebe8b8a-7bac-45f0-8652-4b9d52b95644) was also included in this volume.

Volume 4: Wandering World  
- Chapter 1 - Takeyashiki Shimai, Miyaburareru  
- Chapter 2 - Matsuri Connection:  
About a shut-in girl and a dwarf alien, who lives on her head.  
- Chapter 3 - Too Late for Fantasy:  
When given a magic lamp, 37-year-old Tohru Sugamo wishes for his childhood dream to come true and gains all the powers he thought up once upon a time as a wannabe novelist, but it turns out an eighth grader's ideas aren't the most original - or the kinds of things you'd want causing havoc in your married life.  
- Chapter 4 - Fantastic Eats (Enigma Viking)  
A monster hunter and his erstwhile apprentice make their living selling unknown delicacies. This stuff is safe to eat, right?  
- Chapter 5 - Walking the Void  
When Amada Yuu was a child, the apartments were his entire world. When he learned the truth, the infinte void stretching outside would come to reside inside him as well.

title: The Obsessive Male Lead Made Me The Female Lead
summary:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

title: I will break ties with the harmful sister
summary:
Clara, who had been oppressed for many years by her tyrant sister, Enefia. Even their parents obeyed the sister's wishes, and Clara had no place in the Astraia Baron’s household despite it being her home. In the midst of this, Clara's sister's engagement to a prominent nobleman was decided, and Clara finally felt relieved, believing she would be freed from this hell. However, even after the engagement, the sister's unfaithful nature did not change, and fearing the fiancé might discover the inconvenient truth, the parents ordered Clara to monitor her sister. Despite Clara's efforts, her sister became pregnant with another man's child. The engagement was broken off, and the sister quickly eloped somewhere, leaving the Astraia Baron’s household with a huge debt, angering the influential nobleman. In order to repay her family's debts, Clara was sold to a sadistic noble and faced severe torture, ultimately approaching death.

"If I could do it over again... This time, I will definitely kill you!" When Clara opened her eyes again, time had rewound to the day of her sister’s engagement. Revived with strong determination, Clara pushed back against her sister's insidious bullying and ran to change the worst possible future.

title: The Second Eunuch Regains His Manhood
summary:
[By Force & LICO studio that brought you <Return of Mount Hua Sect> and <Chronicles of the Demon Faction>,  and many more!

The eunuch Lee Cheolsu, a secret power figure who controls the affairs of the empire at will. He possesses absolute power, wealth, and even strong martial arts skills… but what does that mean? If he can’t “do that”!!
Through a reincarnation technique, Cheolsu returns to the time before he became a eunuch. He has one goal in mind: to become an alpha male and enjoy life with the most beautiful women!!
A full-fledged 15+ rated(?) comic martial arts story about Cheolsu, who lives purely for his desires, begins!

title: One Hundred Thousand Years of Tribulation by Heavenly Thunder
summary:
After transmigrating into a cultivation world, young Fang Lingxiao rises to greatness with a talent that defies the heavens. In just a hundred years, he reaches the peak—the Great Ascension Stage. But during his final tribulation, the heavens unleash something unimaginable: a lightning storm that rages not for days or months, but for a hundred thousand years.

When he finally emerges from the ordeal, his cultivation is shattered—reduced to that of a mere mortal. Yet, his body, forged by countless years under divine lightning, has become indestructible.

Soon, Fang Lingxiao realizes the truth—this wasn’t fate. It was sabotage from a powerful figure in the Upper Realm.

Now, with his cultivation lost but an unbreakable body as his weapon, he sets out on a path of vengeance. He’ll uncover the traitor, climb the heavens once more, and make them all pay.

title: The Thousand Faces Actor
summary:
"What do you think people will end up calling him?"

Someone asked. But no one had an answer.

A transcendent being has appeared in the world.
And a new chapter in film history begins.

title: Hades & Persephone
summary: This series including fanfic short stories about the famous couple in Greek mythology- Hades and Persephone and some other couples as well.

title: Should I Make You a Nuclear Weapon?
summary:
Director Kim Jun of the Defense Science Research Institute faces a tragic end while protecting the ADD chip, a military secret of South Korea, during a terrorist attack in 2024.

However, he suddenly finds himself with an unexpected opportunity: he is reborn in the body of his friend Jeon Hyun-seung, who died in 1998!

Revived as Kim Jun, he discovers that he can access future technologies using the ADD chip engraved in his body.

"If you give me the chance... I’ll show you what I can create within three months."

Create the ultimate weapon to overcome the IMF crisis with future technology! Let me know if you need anything else!

title: It’s Okay to Be Left Out
summary: Our company is pleasing to the eye! From the gentle team leader to the handsome CEO! However, I made a ridiculous mistake at the new employee welcome party. The wonderful team leader until yesterday is starting to turn away from me... I can't put an end to my love for the team leader like this! I was going straight and going straight until you accepted my virtue... But can someone tell me why this becomes a love affair and not a virtue?

title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”

title: What’s With the Three Kingdoms-Obsessed Male Lead?
I Ran Away and Got Married
summary:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%A4%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%84-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%90%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3299), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61190666)

title: A Beast Swallowed by a Flower
summary:
“A wolf only keeps one female by its side, Lisi.”

Iris was called the flower of the Whitlow Duchy, but in reality, she lived a life no better than a weed. The man named Caverant Green, who deliberately approached her to live a comfortable life again, was an extremely hot and beast-like man. Every time she make eye contact with the leader of the beastmen, a dangerous atmosphere blooms between them…

---
A bargain for her life, to escape a tragic future. When Iris Whittle is murdered by her sadistic husband, she is sent back in time to when she was 20 years old. As the unwanted daughter of a duke, Iris realizes she can leverage her status and foresight to secure a better life this time around. Thus, Iris makes a daring marriage proposal to the fearsome Count Keibrandt Green, the most eligible bachelor of Gavizar Empire, whose gruff and stern demeanor hides the fangs of a wolf.
